Join.Name: STUDENTS
Join.SQL: STUDENTS S

Join.Name: COUNTRY
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_COUNTRY GC on (GC.COUNTRYID = S.COUNTRYID)

Join.Name: SPECIALITY
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_SPECIALITY GSP on (GSP.SPECIALITYID = S.SPECIALITYID)

Join.Name: EDULEVEL
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDULEVEL GEL on (GEL.EDULEVELID = GSP.EDULEVELID)

Join.Name: EDUDIRECTION
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION GER on (GER.EDUDIRECTIONID = GSP.EDUDIRECTIONID)

Join.Name: SPECIALITY_CODE
Join.SQL: left join V_SPECIALITYCODE GSPC on (GSPC.SPECIALITYID = S.SPECIALITYID)

Join.Name: STATUS
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_STATUS GST on (GST.STATUS = S.STATUS)

Join.Name: EDUYEAR
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EDUYEAR GEY on (GEY.EDUYEAR = S.EDUYEAR)

Join.Name: EDUFORM
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUFORM GEF on (GEF.EDUFORMID = S.EDUFORMID)

Join.Name: EDUBASIS
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUBASIS GEB on (GEB.EDUBASISID = S.EDUBASISID)

Join.Name: EDUTERM
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUTERM GET on (GET.EDUTERM = S.EDUTERM)

Join.Name: DEPARTMENT
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_DEPARTMENT GED on (GED.DEPARTMENTID = S.DEPARTMENTID)

Join.Name: EMPLOYER
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EMPLOYER GEMP on (GEMP.EMP_ID = GED.BOSSID)

Join.Name: HS_FIO_PREV
Join.SQL: left join SP_FIO_PREV(S.STUDENTID, '01.01.3000', 0) HSFP on (1 = 1)

Join.Name: COURSE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_SEMESTER GSEM on (GSEM.SEMESTER = S.SEMESTER)

Join.Name: REGION
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_REGION GRG on (GRG.REGIONID = S.REGIONID)

Join.Name: REGION1
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_REGION GRG1 on (GRG1.REGIONID = S.DIRECTIONPLACEID)

Join.Name: FAMILYSTATUS
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_FAMILYSTATUS GFS on (GFS.FAMILYSTATUS = S.FAMILYSTATUS)

Join.Name: PLANRASP
Join.SQL: left join PLANRASP PS on (PS.PLANRASPID = S.PLANRASPID)

Join.Name: APPOINTMENT
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_APPOINTMENT APP on (APP.APPOINTMENTID = PS.APPOINTMENTID)

Join.Name: POST
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_POST GPST on (GPST.POSTID = S.POSTID)

Join.Name: MINISTRY
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_MINISTRY GMS on (GMS.MINISTRYID = S.MINISTRYID)

Join.Name: HOSPITALTYPE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_HOSPITALTYPE GHT on (GHT.HOSPITALTYPEID = S.HOSPITALTYPEID)

Join.Name: HOSPITALSTATUS
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_HOSPITALSTATUS GHS on (GHS.HOSPITALSTATUSID = S.HOSPITALSTATUSID)

Join.Name: PRIVILEGE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_PRIVILEGE GP on (GP.PRIVILEGEID = S.PRIVILEGEID)

Join.Name: STUDENT2PROTOCOL
Join.SQL: inner join STUDENT2PROTOCOL S2P on (S2P.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID)

Join.Name: V_STUDENT_MODULES
Join.SQL: inner join V_STUDENT_MODULES VS2M on (VS2M.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID)

Join.Name: DIC_USTAN
Join.SQL: left join DIC_USTAN DU on (DU.DIC_USTAN_UID = S.DIC_USTAN_UID)

Join.Name: DIC_PODRAZD
Join.SQL: left join DIC_PODRAZD DP on (DP.DIC_PODRAZD_UID = S.DIC_PODRAZD_UID)

Join.Name: STUDENTS
Join.SQL: STUDENTS S

Join.Name: FIO
Join.SQL: left join HS_FIO HSF on (HSF.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSF.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_FIO where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) )

Join.Name: MOVEMENT
Join.SQL: left join HS_MOVEMENT_FULL HSM on (HSM.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and HSM.BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate and HSM.ENDDATE > ?CurDate /* left join STUDENTTOORDER STO on (STO.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (STO.ORDERID = HSM.ORDERID) and STO.CANCELED = 0*/

Join.Name: SPECIALITY
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_SPECIALITY GSP on (GSP.SPECIALITYID = HSM.SPECIALITYID)

Join.Name: EDULEVEL
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDULEVEL GEL on (GEL.EDULEVELID = GSP.EDULEVELID)

Join.Name: EDUDIRECTION
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION GER on (GER.EDUDIRECTIONID = GSP.EDUDIRECTIONID)

Join.Name: STRUCTURE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_STRUCTURE GSTR on (GSTR.STRUCTUREID = GSP.STRUCTUREID)

Join.Name: EDUDIRECTION_RASP
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION_RASP GSTR on (GEDR.EDUDIRECTION_RASPID = GSP.EDUDIRECTION_RASPID)

Join.Name: SPECIALITY_CODE
Join.SQL: left join V_SPECIALITYCODE GSPC on (GSPC.SPECIALITYID = HSM.SPECIALITYID)

Join.Name: EDUYEAR
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EDUYEAR GEY on (GEY.EDUYEAR = HSM.EDUYEAR)

Join.Name: STATUS
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_STATUS GST on (GST.STATUS = HSM.STATUS)

Join.Name: EDUFORM
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUFORM GEF on (GEF.EDUFORMID = HSM.EDUFORMID)

Join.Name: EDUBASIS
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUBASIS GEB on (GEB.EDUBASISID = HSM.EDUBASISID)

Join.Name: EDUTERM
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_EDUTERM GET on (GET.EDUTERM = HSM.EDUTERM)

Join.Name: DEPARTMENT
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_DEPARTMENT GED on (GED.DEPARTMENTID = HSM.DEPARTMENTID)

Join.Name: EMPLOYER
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_EMPLOYER GEMP on (GEMP.EMP_ID = GED.BOSSID)

Join.Name: COURSE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_SEMESTER GSEM on (GSEM.SEMESTER = HSM.SEMESTER)

Join.Name: COUNTRY
Join.SQL: left join HS_COUNTRY HSC on (HSC.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSC.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_COUNTRY where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) ) left join V_GUIDE_COUNTRY GC on (GC.COUNTRYID = HSC.COUNTRYID)

Join.Name: GROUPNUM
Join.SQL: left join HS_GROUPNUM HSGN on (HSGN.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSGN.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_GROUPNUM where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) )

Join.Name: HOSTEL
Join.SQL: left join HS_HOSTEL HSH on (HSH.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSH.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_HOSTEL where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) )

Join.Name: ORPHAN
Join.SQL: left join HS_ORPHAN HSO on (HSO.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSO.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_ORPHAN where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) )

Join.Name: STREAM
Join.SQL: left join HS_STREAM HSSTM on (HSSTM.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSSTM.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_STREAM where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) )

Join.Name: FAMILYSTATUS
Join.SQL: left join HS_FAMILYSTATUS HSFS on (HSFS.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID) and (HSFS.BEGINDATE = ( select first 1 BEGINDATE from HS_FAMILYSTATUS where STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID and BEGINDATE <= ?CurDate order by BEGINDATE desc) ) left join V_GUIDE_FAMILYSTATUS GFS on (GFS.FAMILYSTATUS = HSFS.FAMILYSTATUS)

Join.Name: HS_FIO_PREV
Join.SQL: left join SP_FIO_PREV(S.STUDENTID, ?CurDate, 1) HSFP on (1 = 1)

Join.Name: REGION
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_REGION RG on (RG.REGIONID = S.REGIONID)

Join.Name: REGION1
Join.SQL: left join V_GUIDE_REGION RG1 on (RG1.REGIONID = S.DIRECTIONPLACEID)

Join.Name: PLANRASP
Join.SQL: left join PLANRASP PS on (PS.PLANRASPID = S.PLANRASPID)

Join.Name: APPOINTMENT
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_APPOINTMENT APP on (APP.APPOINTMENTID = PS.APPOINTMENTID)

Join.Name: POST
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_POST GPST on (GPST.POSTID = S.POSTID)

Join.Name: MINISTRY
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_MINISTRY GMS on (GMS.MINISTRYID = S.MINISTRYID)

Join.Name: HOSPITALTYPE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_HOSPITALTYPE GHT on (GHT.HOSPITALTYPEID = S.HOSPITALTYPEID)

Join.Name: HOSPITALSTATUS
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_HOSPITALSTATUS GHS on (GHS.HOSPITALSTATUSID = S.HOSPITALSTATUSID)

Join.Name: PRIVILEGE
Join.SQL: left join GUIDE_PRIVILEGE GP on (GP.PRIVILEGEID = S.PRIVILEGEID)

Join.Name: STUDENT2PROTOCOL
Join.SQL: inner join STUDENT2PROTOCOL S2P on (S2P.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID)

Join.Name: V_STUDENT_MODULES
Join.SQL: inner join V_STUDENT_MODULES VS2M on (VS2M.STUDENTID = S.STUDENTID)

Field.Name: COUNTRYNAME
Field.Caption: Гражданство
Field.LookupSQL: select COUNTRYID, COUNTRYNAME from V_GUIDE_COUNTRY where USE = 1 order by COUNTRYNAME

Field.Name: COUNTRYNAME_ENG
Field.Caption: Гражданство (англ.)
Field.LookupSQL: select COUNTRYID, COUNTRYNAME_ENG from V_GUIDE_COUNTRY where USE = 1 order by COUNTRYNAME

Field.Name: SEMESTER
Field.Caption: Семестр
Field.LookupSQL: select GS.SEMESTER, GS.SEMESTER from GUIDE_SEMESTER GS where GS.USE = 1 order by GS.SEMESTER

Field.Name: EDUYEARSTR
Field.Caption: Уч. год
Field.LookupSQL: select GEY.EDUYEAR, GEY.EDUYEARSTR from GUIDE_EDUYEAR GEY where GEY.USE = 1 order by GEY.EDUYEAR

Field.Name: SPECIALITY
Field.Caption: Специальность
Field.LookupSQL: select SPECIALITYID, SPECIALITY from V_GUIDE_SPECIALITY where USE = 1 order by SPECIALITY

Field.Name: SPECIALITY_CODE
Field.Caption: Специальность с кодом
Field.LookupSQL: select SPECIALITYID, CODE || ' - ' || SPECIALITY as SPECIALITY_CODE from V_GUIDE_SPECIALITY where USE = 1 order by 2

Field.Name: STATUSNAME
Field.Caption: Статус
Field.LookupSQL: select STATUS, STATUSNAME from V_GUIDE_STATUS order by STATUSNAME

Field.Name: EDUFORM
Field.Caption: Форма обучения
Field.LookupSQL: select EDUFORMID, EDUFORM from V_GUIDE_EDUFORM where USE = 1 order by EDUFORM

Field.Name: EDUBASIS
Field.Caption: Форма финансирования
Field.LookupSQL: select EDUBASISID, EDUBASIS from V_GUIDE_EDUBASIS where USE = 1 order by EDUBASIS

Field.Name: EDUTERMNAME
Field.Caption: Срок обучения
Field.LookupSQL: select EDUTERM, EDUTERMNAME from V_GUIDE_EDUTERM where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: DEPARTMENT
Field.Caption: Подразделение
Field.LookupSQL: select DEPARTMENTID, DEPARTMENT from V_GUIDE_DEPARTMENT where USE = 1 order by DEPARTMENT

Field.Name: EMP_FIO
Field.Caption: Руководитель подразделения
Field.LookupSQL: select EMP_ID, EMP_FIO from GUIDE_EMPLOYER order by EMP_FIO

Field.Name: EMP_FIO_ENG
Field.Caption: Руководитель подразделения (англ.)
Field.LookupSQL: select EMP_ID, EMP_FIO_ENG from GUIDE_EMPLOYER order by EMP_FIO_ENG

Field.Name: REGIONNAME
Field.Caption: Область проживания
Field.LookupSQL: select REGIONID, REGIONNAME from V_GUIDE_REGION where USE = 1 order by COUNTRY, REGIONNAME

Field.Name: EDUCATIONALINSTITUTION
Field.Caption: Название и дата окончания уч. зав.

Field.Name: DIRECTIONPLACE
Field.Caption: Область целевого направления
Field.LookupSQL: select REGIONID, REGIONNAME from V_GUIDE_REGION where USE = 1 order by COUNTRY, REGIONNAME

Field.Name: OWNER
Field.Caption: Ответственный
Field.LookupSQL: select UGNAME, UGNAME from SEC_USERSGROUPS where RTYPE = 'U' order by 1

Field.Name: FAMILYSTATUSNAME
Field.Caption: Семейное положение
Field.LookupSQL: select FAMILYSTATUS, FAMILYSTATUSNAME from V_GUIDE_FAMILYSTATUS order by 1

Field.Name: APPOINTMENT
Field.Caption: Распределение|Место распределения
Field.LookupSQL: select APPOINTMENTID, APPOINTMENT from GUIDE_APPOINTMENT where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: MINISTRY
Field.Caption: Распределение|Министерство
Field.LookupSQL: select MINISTRYID, MINISTRY from GUIDE_MINISTRY order by 1

Field.Name: POST
Field.Caption: Распределение|Должность
Field.LookupSQL: select POSTID, POST from GUIDE_POST where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: HOSPITALTYPE
Field.Caption: Распределение|Тип учреждения
Field.LookupSQL: select HOSPITALTYPEID, HOSPITALTYPE from GUIDE_HOSPITALTYPE where USE = 1 order by 2

Field.Name: HOSPITALSTATUS
Field.Caption: Распределение|Статус учреждения
Field.LookupSQL: select HOSPITALSTATUSID, HOSPITALSTATUS from GUIDE_HOSPITALSTATUS where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: PRIVILEGE
Field.Caption: Льготы при поступлении
Field.LookupSQL: select PRIVILEGEID, PRIVILEGE from GUIDE_PRIVILEGE where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: PLANRASP
Field.Caption: Место распределения
Field.LookupSQL: select PR.PLANRASPID, cast(PR.PLANYEAR as varchar(4)) || '. ' || GAP.APPOINTMENT from PLANRASP PR inner join GUIDE_APPOINTMENT GAP on (GAP.APPOINTMENTID = PR.APPOINTMENTID) where PR.PLANYEAR = ( select EDUYEAR + 1 from STUDENTS where STUDENTID = ?STUDENTID ) or PR.PLANRASPID = ( select PLANRASPID from STUDENTS where STUDENTID = ?STUDENTID ) order by PR.PLANRASPNUM

Field.Name: DISCIPLINETYPE
Field.Caption: Тип
Field.LookupSQL: select DISCIPLINETYPE, DISCIPLINETYPENAME from V_GUIDE_DISCIPLINETYPE order by 1

Field.Name: FORMREPORT
Field.Caption: Контроль
Field.LookupSQL: select FORMREPORT, FORMREPORTNAME from V_GUIDE_FORMREPORT where USE = 1 order by 2

Field.Name: MARKID
Field.Caption: Результат
Field.LookupSQL: select MARKID, MARKNAME from V_GUIDE_MARKTYPE order by 1

Field.Name: DISCIPLINETYPE
Field.Caption: Тип
Field.LookupSQL: select DISCIPLINETYPE, DISCIPLINETYPENAME from V_GUIDE_DISCIPLINETYPE order by 1

Field.Name: DISCIPLINETYPE
Field.Caption: Тип
Field.LookupSQL: select DISCIPLINETYPE, DISCIPLINETYPENAME from V_GUIDE_DISCIPLINETYPE order by 1

Field.Name: FORMREPORT
Field.Caption: Контроль
Field.LookupSQL: select FORMREPORT, FORMREPORTNAME from V_GUIDE_FORMREPORT where USE = 1 order by 1

Field.Name: DISCIPLINETYPE
Field.Caption: Тип
Field.LookupSQL: select DISCIPLINETYPE, DISCIPLINETYPENAME from V_GUIDE_DISCIPLINETYPE order by 1

Field.Name: EDULEVELID
Field.Caption: Общеобразовательный уровень
Field.LookupSQL: select EDULEVELID, EDULEVEL from V_GUIDE_EDULEVEL order by 1

Field.Name: EDUDIRECTIONID_LOOKUP
Field.Caption: Направление подготовки (ID)
Field.LookupSQL: select EDUDIRECTIONID, EDUDIRECTION from GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION where USE = 1 order by 2

Field.Name: EDUDIRECTION_RASPID_LOOKUP
Field.Caption: Направление распределения (ID)
Field.LookupSQL: select EDUDIRECTION_RASPID, EDUDIRECTION_RASP from GUIDE_EDUDIRECTION_RASP where USE = 1 order by 2

Field.Name: STRUCTUREID
Field.Caption: Структура вуза (ID)
Field.LookupSQL: select STRUCTUREID, STRUCTURE from GUIDE_STRUCTURE order by 2

Field.Name: DISCIPLINETYPE
Field.Caption: Тип
Field.LookupSQL: select DISCIPLINETYPE, DISCIPLINETYPENAME from V_GUIDE_DISCIPLINETYPE order by 1

Field.Name: REASONCATEGORY
Field.Caption: Категория основания
Field.LookupSQL: select REASONCATEGORYID, REASONCATEGORY from V_GUIDE_REASONCATEGORY order by 1

Item.Value: Ответственный секретарь комиссии по переводам и восстановлениям

Field.Name: BOSSID
Field.Caption: ФИО руководителя
Field.LookupSQL: select EMP_ID, EMP_FIO from GUIDE_EMPLOYER order by 2
